title: Where to find Hard Rock fonts
content:
Curious about the slogan and the logo fonts. Obviously slab serif for the slogan but not sure which, and I don’t have any leads on the logo. I’m doing a parody of the ad for a school project and am even not sure how to find a high res version of the fork. Any help appreciated,  
Thanks!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [HR\_webbanner.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20080821150400/http:/typophile.com/files/HR_webbanner.png) | 45.8 KB |

 [‹ Beautiful Serif !!!!!!](http://web.archive.org/web/20080821150400/http:/www.typophile.com/node/44757 "Go to previous forum topic") [Font ID: Bioneers Signage ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080821150400/http:/www.typophile.com/node/44752 "Go to next forum topic")
author: hday

comments.content:
It almost looks like [Amasis Bold](http://web.archive.org/web/20080821150400/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/agfa/amasis/) had stroke added to simulate an Ultra weight. (The Black weight has no mid-serif on the F).

- Mike Yanega

Hannah, Have you ever been to brandsoftheworld.com?

[http://www.brandsoftheworld.com/search/48742050/161774.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20080821150400/http:/www.brandsoftheworld.com/search/48742050/161774.html "http://www.brandsoftheworld.com/search/48742050/161774.html")
